# UIMenuController.ArrowDirection.down

**Case**

The arrow is pointing down at the object of focus.

## Declaration

```swift
case down
```

## Constants

- **UIMenuController.ArrowDirection.default**: The arrow is pointing up or down at the object of focus based on its location in the screen.
- **UIMenuController.ArrowDirection.up**: The arrow is pointing up at the object of focus.
- **UIMenuController.ArrowDirection.left**: The arrow is pointing left at the object of focus.
- **UIMenuController.ArrowDirection.right**: The arrow is pointing right at the object of focus.
